AGR 2 (Farm Mechanization) Scheme for Fa.details: Launched by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat, this scheme provides financial assistance to farmers for the purchase of agricultural equipment to increase crop production.
benefits: Financial assistance for purchasing agricultural equipment
Enhancement of crop production through mechanization
eligibility: Farmers other than those belonging to SC/ST categories

Saat Pagla Khedut Kalyanna.details: Launched in September 2020, this scheme by the Department of Agriculture and Farmers’ Welfare and Co-operation aims to benefit farmers through seven steps, including irrigation system improvements, thereby achieving the objective of 'Per Drop More Crop' and contributing towards doubling farmers’ income in Gujarat.

Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment.details: A national scheme implemented in Gujarat to provide at least 100 days of wage employment in a financial year to every rural household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.
eligibility: Willingness to do unskilled manual work
application_process: Apply through the local Gram Panchayat
Await job card issuance and work allocation

Swachh Bharat Mission (Gramin).details: A national initiative implemented in Gujarat to eliminate open defecation in rural areas by constructing individual household latrines, community sanitary complexes, and promoting hygiene practices.
eligibility: Rural households without access to toilets
application_process: Apply through the local Gram Panchayat

Scheme of Assistance for Common Environm.details: This scheme provides financial aid for projects that promote pollution control, waste management, and environmental sustainability. It supports industries and organizations in establishing and upgrading environmental management infrastructure.
benefits: Support for pollution control and waste management projects
application_process: Submit necessary project proposals and documents

Scheme for Development of Green Estate.details: Under the Gujarat Industrial Policy, this scheme supports the relocation or retrofitting of polluting industrial units to designated green estates, thereby reducing environmental pollution and promoting sustainable industrial practices.
benefits: Financial assistance for relocation or retrofitting
eligibility: Willingness to relocate or retrofit to green estates

Jyotigram Yojana.details: An initiative by the Government of Gujarat to ensure 24-hour, three-phase quality power supply to rural areas and supply power to farmers residing in scattered farmhouses through feeder lines with specially designed transformers.
benefits: Uninterrupted power supply to rural areas
eligibility: Rural households and farmers in Gujarat
application_process: Automatic inclusion based on area coverage
